text: José Isidro Gonçalves Maciel (born 13 February 1989) is a Portuguese cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . He rode in the 2015 Vuelta a España. His biggest win to date was the overall at the 2016 Tour of Turkey. He was named in the start list for the 2017 Giro d'Italia. In July 2019, he was named in the startlist for the 2019 Tour de France. ==Major results== ;2009 : 2nd Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2011 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships : 1st Stage 2 Volta a Coruña : 2nd Volta a Portugal do Futuro : 8th Road race, UEC European Under-23 Road Championships ;2012 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 1st Stage 1 GP Efapel : 3rd Overall Troféu Joaquim Agostinho ::1st 20px Young rider classification : 6th Overall Volta ao Alentejo ;2013 : 1st Polynormande : 1st 20px Mountains classification Paris–Arras Tour : 3rd Overall Tour of China I ;2014 : 4th Overall Tour of Hainan : 6th Overall Tour of Qinghai Lake ;2015 : 1st Stage 5 Volta a Portugal : 4th Overall Boucles de la Mayenne : 20px Combativity award Stage 2 Vuelta a España ;2016 : 1st 20px Overall Presidential Tour of Turkey : 1st Stage 2 GP Beiras e Serra da Estrela : 1st Stage 7 Volta a Portugal : 4th Time trial, National Road Championships : 5th Overall Boucles de la Mayenne : 7th Boucles de l'Aulne ;2017 : 1st 20px Overall Ster ZLM Toer ::1st Stage 4 : 4th Road race, National Road Championships ;2018 : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2019 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !
